title: Democrat Mask Mandates Make COVID Worse?!
description:
Since we’re free from YouTube, we can tell you the truth about mask mandates: They suck, they make COVID worse, and anyone who promotes them is an imbecile. Speaking of imbeciles, Rep. AOC had some silly things to say about the border crisis that we’re going to have fun with. Critical race theory has invaded the Muppets. Plus the latest in virtue-signaling over Georgia’s new voter bill.
GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/show-notes-mask-mandate
